PlayerBasicAttack.Name: PlayerBasicAttack
PlayerBasicAttack.Narrative: thrusts forward with a basic strike.

ShadowSting.Name: ShadowSting
ShadowSting.Narrative: unleashes a shadowy dart that poisons the target.

VeilSlash.Name: VeilSlash
VeilSlash.Narrative: slashes through the veil between worlds, causing a deep, bleeding wound.

EtherPulse.Name: EtherPulse
EtherPulse.Narrative: sends out a pulse of ethereal energy, stunning the target.

DarkFury.Name: DarkFury
DarkFury.Narrative: channels the anger of the shadows, striking with furious might.

SpectralBind.Name: SpectralBind
SpectralBind.Narrative: casts chains from the spectral plane, immobilizing the target.

GhastlyWail.Name: GhastlyWail
GhastlyWail.Narrative: lets out a terrifying wail from beyond, instilling fear.

VoidBurst.Name: VoidBurst
VoidBurst.Narrative: releases a burst of void energy, silencing spells.

NetherSnare.Name: NetherSnare
NetherSnare.Narrative: summons a snare from the netherworld, slowing the target.

ShadowReave.Name: ShadowReave
ShadowReave.Narrative: sweeps the area with a reaving shadow, dispelling magic.
